{"id":1798885806,"question_id":4055,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1Â month","timestamp":1760237398,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"314 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1798885806/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Balanced Substring I","memory":"29 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int longestBalanced(string s) {\n        int N = (int)s.size();\n\n        vector<vector<int>> pref(N+1, vector<int>(26, 0));\n        for (int i=0; i<N; i++) {\n            pref[i+1] = pref[i];\n            pref[i+1][s[i]-'a']++;\n        }\n\n        int ans = 1;\n        for (int l=0; l<N; l++) {\n            for (int r=l+1; r<N; r++) {\n                int first = -1;\n                for (int k=0; k<26; k++) {\n                    int diff = pref[r+1][k] - pref[l][k];\n                    if (diff != 0) {\n                        if (first == -1) first = diff;\n                        else if (first != diff) {\n                            first = -1;\n                            break;\n                        }\n                    }\n                } \n                if (first != -1)\n                    ans = max(ans, r-l+1);\n            }\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-balanced-substring-i","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1,"frontend_id":1261}
